description: Try our easy to follow Thai Chicken Noodle Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thai Chicken Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the noodles, cucumber and chilli to the chicken mixture and toss gently to combine. Scatter over the coriander leaves and serve immediately.
